paragraphs.title: Pre-requests
paragraphs.text:
%md

In order to run this notebook localy, do

 - set env vars for Github access
 
  ```
    export GH_USER="..."
    export GH_TOKEN="..."
  ```

paragraphs.title: 2. Read the data
paragraphs.text:
val dataFiles = s"${sys.env("HOME")}/github-archive/*.json.gz"
val df = sqlc.read.json(dataFiles)
df.registerTempTable("ga")

paragraphs.title: 3a. Exploration - Event types
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT type, count(*) as cnt FROM ga GROUP BY type ORDER BY cnt DESC

paragraphs.title: 3b. Exploration - top 10 Orgs for eventType
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT org.login, count(*) as cnt FROM ga 
WHERE type = "${EventType=WatchEvent,PushEvent|CreateEvent|WatchEvent|IssueCommentEvent|PullRequestEvent|PublicEvent}"
      AND org.login <> "null"
GROUP BY org.login
ORDER BY cnt DESC
LIMIT 10

paragraphs.title: 4. Filter the data

result.msg: orgsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [actor: struct<avatar_url:string,gravatar_id:string,id:bigint,login:string,url:string>, created_at: string, id: string, org: struct<avatar_url:string,gravatar_id:string,id:bigint,login:string,url:string>, payload: struct<action:string,before:string,comment:struct<_links:struct<html:struct<href:string>,pull_request:struct<href:string>,self:struct<href:string>>,body:string,commit_id:string,created_at:string,diff_hunk:string,html_url:string,id:bigint,issue_url:string,line:bigint,original_commit_id:string,original_position:bigint,path:string,position:bigint,pull_request_url:string,updated_at:string,url:string,user:struct<avatar_url:string,events_url:string,followers_url:string,following_url:string,gists_url:string,gravatar_id:string,html_url:string,i...

paragraphs.title: 5. Github API call
paragraphs.text:
import scalaj.http.Http
val ghUser = sys.env("GH_USER")
val ghToken = sys.env("GH_TOKEN")
val repos = orgsDF.select("repo.url").map { column =>
  // https://developer.github.com/v3/auth/#basic-authentication - oAuth or personal access token
  Http(column.getAs[String]("url")).auth(s"$ghUser", s"$ghToken").asString.body
}

repos.saveAsTextFile(s"${sys.env("HOME")}/github-archive/$date-repos")
val reposDF = sqlc.read.json(s"${sys.env("HOME")}/github-archive/$date-repos")
reposDF.registerTempTable("repos")
reposDF.count

result.msg:
import scalaj.http.Http
ghUser: String = bzz
ghToken: String = 45f78621e6bb414bc228f42eb6e558fdc8cbd47d
repos: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = MapPartitionsRDD[58] at map at <console>:52
reposDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [archive_url: string, assignees_url: string, blobs_url: string, branches_url: string, clone_url: string, collaborators_url: string, comments_url: string, commits_url: string, compare_url: string, contents_url: string, contributors_url: string, created_at: string, default_branch: string, deployments_url: string, description: string, documentation_url: string, downloads_url: string, events_url: string, fork: boolean, forks: bigint, forks_count: bigint, forks_url: string, full_name: string, git_commits_url: string, git_refs_url: string, git_tags_url: string, git_url: string, has_downloads: boolean, has_issues: boolean, has_pages: boolean, has_wiki: boolean, homepage: string, hooks_url: string, html_url: string, id: bigint, issue_comment_url: string...res12: Long = 114

paragraphs.title: 6. Join over the Github API call
paragraphs.text:
val repos = reposDF.select("id", "html_url", "created_at", "description", "language").as('repo)
val orgs = orgsDF.select("repo.id", "repo.name", "org.avatar_url").as('org)
val report = repos.join(orgs)
                  .where($"repo.id" === $"org.id")
                  .orderBy($"name")
report.registerTempTable("report")

result.msg:
repos: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, html_url: string, created_at: string, description: string, language: string]
orgs: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, name: string, avatar_url: string]
report: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, html_url: string, created_at: string, description: string, language: string, id: bigint, name: string, avatar_url: string]

55077973	https://github.com/Accontech/ace-windows	2016-03-30T16:13:33Z	Accessible Communications for Everyone on Windows	C#	55077973	Accontech/ace-windows	https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/17147397?

paragraphs.title: 7. Generate report Preview
paragraphs.text: def nonEmpty(s: String) = if (s == null) "" else s val reportTemplate = report map { columns => val name = columns.getAs[String]("name") val url = columns.getAs[String]("html_url") val img = columns.getAs[String]("avatar_url") val lang = columns.getAs[String]("language") val descr = columns.getAs[String]("description") Seq(s"%html ", s"%html $name", nonEmpty(lang), nonEmpty(descr) ) mkString("\t") } take(15) mkString("\n")

result.msg: %html Accontech/ace-mac Objective-C Accessible Communications for Everyone on Mac OS/X %html Accontech/ace-windows C# Accessible Communications for Everyone on Windows %html Bloomfield-SP16-CAT308A/Cyberpunk-RPG Mathematica Team 2- Group Game II - SP 2016 - CAT308A - E1

%html Accontech/ace-mac Objective-C Accessible Communications for Everyone on Mac OS/X %html Accontech/ace-windows C# Accessible Communications for Everyone on Windows %html Bloomfield-SP16-CAT308A/Cyberpunk-RPG Mathematica Team 2- Group Game II - SP 2016 - CAT308A - E1 %html CSCMU-204112/FinalProject01 C %html CSE512-16S/a3-arushi3 JavaScript Visualizing protein trajectory information using Time Curves %html Elevationacademy/angular-routing %html Enrise/Hookr PHP Centralized RESTFul task runner API for deployments and more. %html EnvironmentAgency/quke Ruby A template repo for building a Cucumber feature test suite that can be run standalone against a web site %html EsriUK/OS-Highways-tools %html EsriUK/OSMM-Styling Python %html HGGM-LIM/NIR Code for Asier Thesis %html HighOps/ovirt_host_add Python This role will install ovirt 3.6 hosted engine %html Lab41/gestalt Explain data cohesively using visualization %html MagicSketch/MagicPresenter Objective-C Sketch Plugin for Slides/Deck Presentation %html MasterMaps/tme.js JavaScript Thematic Mapping API

paragraphs.title: Generate Final report
paragraphs.text: val emailReport = report map { columns => val name = columns.getAs[String]("name") val url = columns.getAs[String]("html_url") val img = columns.getAs[String]("avatar_url") val lang = columns.getAs[String]("language") val descr = columns.getAs[String]("description") val row = Seq(s"", s"$name", nonEmpty(lang), nonEmpty(descr) ) mkString("") s"$row" } take(10) mkString("\n")

result.msg: emailReport: String = Accontech/ace-macObjective-CAccessible Communications for Everyone on Mac OS/X Accontech/ace-windowsC#Accessible Communications for Everyone on Windows Bloomfield-SP16-CAT308A/Cyberpunk-RPGMathematica...

paragraphs.title: 8. Send by email
paragraphs.text:
val emailTemplate = s"""

Opensourced today: $date

The newest projects on github from the industry leaders

$emailReport
Company Repository Language Description
"""

result.msg:
emailTemplate: String = "

Opensourced today: 2016-05-10

The newest projects on github from the industry leaders

Company Repository Language Description
Accontech/ace-macObjective-CAccessible Communications for Everyone on Mac OS/X

paragraphs.text:
import courier._, Defaults._
import scala.concurrent._
import scala.concurrent.duration._

//requires https://www.google.com/settings/security/lesssecureapps
val mailer = Mailer("smtp.gmail.com", 587)
               .auth(true)
               .as("your-email@ebay.com", "your-password")
               .startTtls(true)()

val sentEmail = mailer(Envelope.from("recepient-email" `@` "recepient-domin.com")
        .to("abezzubov" `@` "nflabs.com")
        .cc("moon"`@`"nflabs.com" )
        .subject(s"Opensource today: new open repos on Github $date")
        .content(Multipart().html(emailTemplate)))

sentEmail.onSuccess {
    case _ => println("A message has been sent!")
}
sentEmail.onFailure { 
    case t => println("An error has occured: " + t.getMessage)
}

Await.ready(sentEmail, 10 seconds)
